title: Dodgeball a True Underdog Story
description:
DODGEBALL A TRUE UNDERDOG STORY
  
[img]http://images.amazon.com/images/P/B0006419IM.01.LZZZZZZZ.jpg[/img]

Year: 2004
Director: Rawson Marshall Thurber
Cast: Vince Vaughn, Ben Stiller, Christine Taylor
Lenght: 92 mns.
Aspect ratio: 16:9
System: PAL   
Audio: 5.1 English and Spanish
Subtitles: Spanish, English, Dansk, Finnish, Svenka 
Full DVD5

Synopsis: Peter LaFleur (Vince Vaughn) is a charismatic underachiever and proprietor of a rundown gym called Average Joe\&#039;s. The facility\&#039;s clientele of decidedly less than \"average Joes\" is made up of a self-styled pirate, a scrawny nerd who dreams of impressing an unattainable cheerleader, an obsessive aficionado of obscure sports, a dim witted young man, and a cocky know it all who, of course, really knows nothing. 
Peter\&#039;s humble gym catches the eye of White Goodman (Ben Stiller), the power mullet sporting, Fu Manchud, egomaniacal owner of Globo Gym, a gleaming monolith of fitness. White intends to take over Average Joe\&#039;s, and Peter\&#039;s non existent bookkeeping is making it all too easy for him. A foreclosing bank has stationed attorney Kate Veatch (Christine Taylor) inside Average Joe\&#039;s to finalize Globo\&#039;s takeover of the gym. But Peter\&#039;s boyish charms win her over and Kate joins his team of social rejects to beat the odds and their own ineptitude to try to save Average Joe\&#039;s. How? A showdown dodgeball competition against Globo Gym

Ben Stiller\&#039;s Cycle at www.solodvd.org
